医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
与针对医学上可行的儿科疾病的基因组相比，通过基因组测序筛查健康儿童是否具有临床价值？研究人员比较了主动基因组测序和医学上可行的基因组在识别健康新生儿和儿童中儿科发病疾病的潜在风险方面的功效。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230802/Is-there-clinical-value-in-screening-healthy-children-with-genome-sequencing-compared-with-a-gene-panel-for-医疗可行的儿科病症.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230802/Is-there-clinical-value-in-screening-healthy-children-with-genome-sequencing-compared-with-a-gene-panel-for-医学上可行的儿科条件.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=fe2e46bd-9103-4cc2-affe-e6e875c6783b Wed, 02 Aug 2023 10:10:00 -0400 Is there clinical value in screening healthy children with genome sequencing compared with a gene panel for medically actionable pediatric conditions?
研究表明，COVID-19 大流行期间的人员短缺给疗养院带来了压力在最近的一项研究中，研究人员定性研究了 COVID-19 大流行期间美国疗养院的人员短缺情况。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230802/Study-suggests-staffing-shortages-during-the-COVID-19-pandemic-placed-strain-on-nursing-homes.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230802/Study-suggests-staffing-shortages-during-the-COVID-19-pandemic-placed-strain-on-nursing-homes.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=811c9421-ed08-4b04-a9ff-99a2e2303271 Wed, 02 Aug 2023 09:50:00 -0400 Study suggests staffing shortages during the COVID-19 pandemic placed strain on nursing homes
医学界的女性在多大程度上改变怀孕时间并调整职业轨迹以适应为人父母和职业生涯？有多少医学界女性为了成为母亲而改变职业轨迹或推迟怀孕。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230802/To-what-extent-do-women-in-medicine-alter-the-timing-of-pregnancy-and-modify-career-trajectories-to-适应-父母身份和职业.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230802/To-what-extent-do-women-in-medicine-alter-the-timing-of-pregnancy-and-modify-career-trajectories-to-适应-父母身份-和-职业.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e7668f04-6fa2-4054-91e1-d1058acfecfd Wed, 02 Aug 2023 09:50:00 -0400 To what extent do women in medicine alter the timing of pregnancy and modify career trajectories to accommodate parenthood and career?
研究发现，外向的人对接种 COVID-19 疫苗更加犹豫在大流行高峰期间，哪些类型的人对接种 COVID-19 疫苗更加犹豫？外向的人-；根据一项针对 40,000 多名加拿大人的新研究。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230802/Extroverts-more-hesitant-to-get-COVID-19-vaccine-study-finds.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230802/Extroverts-more-hesitant-to-get-COVID-19-vaccine-study-finds.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d83ab4d5-587c-4959-8584-fa6cb6f87ef1 Wed, 02 Aug 2023 09:45:59 -0400 Extroverts more hesitant to get COVID-19 vaccine, study finds

童年创伤可能导致老年身体和认知障碍不良的童年经历会对老年产生深远的影响，特别是对于那些经历过暴力的人来说，包括身体和认知障碍。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230802/Childhood-trauma-can-lead-to-physical-and-cognitive-impairments-in-old-age.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230802/Childhood-trauma-can-lead-to-physical-and-cognitive-impairments-in-old-age.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f91ff8a2-a2e4-4069-adee-d53328da575f Wed, 02 Aug 2023 09:14:53 -0400 Childhood trauma can lead to physical and cognitive impairments in old age

美国当代酒精相关死亡率的负担和趋势是否存在性别差异？一组研究人员分析了美国与酒精相关的死亡率的趋势和差异，考虑了性别、年龄、种族、民族和地理区域等因素。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230802/Are-there-sex-based-differences-in-the-contemporary-burden-and-trends-of-alcohol-lated-mortality-in-the-美国.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230802/Are-there-sex-based-differences-in-the-contemporary-burden-and-trends-of-alcohol-lated-mortality-in-the- US.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6ecf87d1-e41b-499e-af46-4265f0dff21d Wed, 02 Aug 2023 08:17:00 -0400 Are there sex-based differences in the contemporary burden and trends of alcohol-related mortality in the US?
